column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Everyone knows that the wait here can be exhausting
column3: but they seem to have the process down to a science
column5: with so many people filling every nook a cranny while they wait
column6: it makes it really difficult for the servers to get through. So
column7: wait in line to give your order
column8: then wait some more until your table is called
column11: deep dish pizza. Coming from pizza-centric New York
column12: my husband did not appreciate the sweet
column15: diced tomato-ey sauce (all of which I loved) for which Malnati's is known. Come give it a try
column16: but prepared to wait and people watch.
